basics.name: Sinong Wang
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: I am a PhD student in Computer Science at the University of Texas at Arlington. My research interests include machine learning, data mining, and natural language processing. I am currently working on the project of unspuervised lexicon discovery.

work.name: CSE department, UT Arlington, TX, USA

publications.name: Phonetic and Lexical Discovery of a Canine Language using HuBERT
publications.summary: This system can highlight phoneme n-grams, present in the vocabulary, in the dog audio uploaded by users.

publications.name: Phonetic and Lexical Discovery of Canine Vocalization
publications.summary: This paper presents an iterative algorithm inspired by human phonetic discovery, which is based on minimal pairs that determine phonemes by distinguishing different words in human language, and is able to produce a complete alphabet of distinct canine phoneme-like units. In addition, the algorithm produces a number of canine repeated acoustic units, which may correspond to specific environments and activities of a dog, composed exclusively of the canine phoneme-like units in the alphabet. The framework outlined in this paper is expected to function not only on canines but other animal species.

publications.name: Toward Automatic Discovery of a Canine Phonetic Alphabet
publications.summary: This paper presents an iterative algorithm inspired by human phonetic discovery, which is based on minimal pairs that determine phonemes by distinguishing different words in human language, and is able to produce a complete alphabet of distinct canine phoneme-like units. In addition, the algorithm produces a number of canine repeated acoustic units, which may correspond to specific environments and activities of a dog, composed exclusively of the canine phoneme-like units in the alphabet. The framework outlined in this paper is expected to function not only on canines but other animal species.

skills.name: Computer Science
keywords: Python, Pytorch, Flask, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

references.name: Professor Chun Chang
references.reference: Sinong is a child with a sincere heart, well-mannered and cultured. It is precisely his sincerity that allows him to immerse himself in his roles, steadily progressing toward his goal without fear of adversity.

references.name: Professor Wei Zhang
references.reference: Failure is often the main theme in scientific research, and the ability to endure continuous setbacks is one of the necessary conditions for success. During the three years of working with Sinong, his passion for science, the constant flow of ideas, and his down-to-earth spirit have convinced me that he will become an excellent scientist.

projects.name: A canine language lexicon discovery analysis system
projects.summary: Developed a system that can automatically discover the lexicon of a canine language.
